data.body:
### Change or Jira reference

https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/PUB-2961

### Justification for exclusion?

Crime Libra published their lists around 9pm and they need to do end to end testing for upcoming CaTH Release 9. So we need to enable STG environment so their requests processed successfully.

data.title: Adds production to autoshutdown
data.body:
### Jira link

https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/DTSPO-28789

### Change description

Adds production to autoshutdown on postgresql servers. If the autoShutdown tag is added and set to true instances will shutdown.  This is to allow ccd sccs instance to be shutdown when not needed. If tags not added to instance they will not be touched
Have also now added prod to auto start up.

### Testing done

using https://github.com/hmcts/auto-shutdown-dev

https://github.com/hmcts/auto-shutdown-dev/actions/runs/21831568275/job/62991101648
